name: FIRE! FIRE! (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description: A fire is raging in a small room, and you can't get a hold of yourself. Your life is now in the hands of nature. Click on fires to put them out. Running into fires will deplete your health. How many fires can you put out? This is the first game I've ever made, sort of. It's the only one that has a titlescreen and some kind of gameplay. It's also for the GMTK Game Jam for 2020, so I had to make it in  48 hours.
